job_description:
Must Have Skills

Hands-on experience with the HL7 FHIR messaging protocol
Hands-on experience with design and construction of REST APIs including Healthcare APIs
working experience in accordance with OPS policies, procedures, WCAG and AODA
J2EE experience in analyzing, design, development, implementation, testing, maintenance and support of large-scale multi-platform, n-tier, web-based applications
Extensive experience with development and implementation using FHIR server and data mapping
Knowledge and experience with the design and construction of REST API services
Knowledge and experience integrating front-end UI with the constructed API
